reviewText: it's a rip off bee movie and yes it came out after bee movie
The greatest animated movie of all time. It's a shame that Bee Movie had to rip this masterpiece off.

The Little Bee.
It is a very cute movie.
I think it could have been executed better.
The voice cast for the English dub is decent. I've heard worse dubs from the 80s to be frank.
It is also very kid appropriate unlike Bee Movie. I like Bee Movie but the Little Bee is something for the kiddies.
The animation and texturing isn't that great but it looks way better than the garbage made by Spark Plug Entertainment.
Don't get me wrong Video Brinquedo has made a lot of bad stuff this just happens to be a rare gem from this studio.
Video Brinquedo's 2D animation looks way worse.
Load of fun. My kids really enjoyed this movie !!!
Very cute, especially since my child loves bumble bees!

OH MY GOD THIS IS THE GREATEST MOVIE I'VE EVER SEEN IN MY LIFE! THERE'S A BEE AND HE LIKES MAKING HONEY. AND THEN THERE'S THIS GIRL BEE AND SHE LIKES TO FIGHT. AND THEN THE QUEEN DOES STUFF. AND THEN THE HIVE IS SAVED FROM THE HUMAN SCOURGE. DOWN WITH HUMANITY, UP WITH BEES! FOR THE HIVE!
